library.description: Main library with study rooms, computer lab, and quiet zones
library.directions: From the main entrance, go straight until you see the Academic Block A. The library is on the ground floor, clearly marked with a large sign.

cs lab.directions: Enter the Computer Science Block, take the stairs to the first floor. The lab is at the end of the corridor.

admin block.directions: From Gate 2, walk straight for 100 meters. The Admin Block is on your left, with a large flag pole in front.

cafeteria.description: Main dining area serving breakfast, lunch, and snacks
cafeteria.directions: Located in the Student Center, accessible from the main courtyard. Look for the food court sign.

gym.description: Fitness center with weights and cardio equipment
gym.directions: Behind the main sports field. Follow the path with blue signs to the Sports Complex.

bookstore.description: Sells textbooks, stationery, and college merchandise
bookstore.directions: Located in Academic Block B near the main entrance. Look for the green awning.

medical center.description: Provides basic medical care and first aid
medical center.directions: Next to the main gate, marked with a red cross sign.

student services.description: Handles student registrations, forms, and academic queries
student services.directions: Take the stairs in Academic Block A to the second floor. The office is right after the library.

steps: Admin Block will be on your left with a flag pole in front
Go straight until you see Academic Block A
Library is on the ground floor

admin_to_cs_lab.description: From Admin Block to CS Lab
steps: Turn right at the Computer Science Block
CS Lab is at the end of the corridor
